#summary create/update/upsert/delete/undelete multiple records at once.

= Introduction =

While !Srecord_ActiveRecord#create() method is used for creating single record, !Srecord_Schema::createAll() method is used for creating multiple records at once.

= createAll =

!Srecord_Schema::createAll() creates all records with specified array of srecords.<br/>
You can check the result by using getState() method.
{{{
$a1 = new Sobject_Account();
$a1->Name = 'Scott';

$a2 = new Sobject_Account();
$a2->Name = 'Tigger';

Srecord_Schema::createAll(array($a1,$a2));

if ($a1->getState() === Srecord_ActiveRecord::STATE_SUCCESS) {
    // success
} else {
    // false
    print_r($a1->getErrors());
}

}}}

Other methods like updateAll, upsertAll, deleteAll and undeleteAll is similar to this.
